data.title: Best Chinese food in Pasco!
data.text: I've been going to this restaurant since the early 1980's. Their food is really really good, and you get a lot of food for your money. Their staff is very quick and friendly. The restaurant is huge and seats many many people, There's also two separate rooms which seats groups of families. If you are a Chinese food lover, you will enjoy this restaurant like I do.

data.title: Delicious take out food
data.text: I have never eaten in the restaurant, though it is very popular with locals between 4 p.m. and 6 p.m.  I have picked up take out Chinese food which was delicious.  I would recommend checking your bags to make sure all of your food is in the bags.  The restaurant is dark inside and I haven't wanted to sit in that environment.

data.title: Not good
data.text: This is not good food.  Over-salted, extra greasy, and, by the look of the establishment, I'm not sure how sanitary it is.  The service was average at best.  This place has been here for a long time.  I can't quite figure out how.  Pasco citizens must have very poor expectations, or very poor taste buds.  It's almost unbelievable that a city of nearly 70,000 can do no better than this in terms of Chinese food.  Save your money and go elsewhere.

data.title: Don't go
data.text: I am extremely mind boggled by all the positive reviews. I can only assume those people never had good chinese food, because this IS NOT GOOD CHINESE FOOD!  It is like it came from a can and disguised with other seasoning. My family couldn't wait to leave and buy over priced snacks at the airport.

data.title: A Tasty Variety of Chinese Dishes
data.text:
My husband and I enjoy the wonderful flavors of the many dishes served here.  We especially like the egg flower soup.  It is so refreshing and satisfying.  We often order the fried wontons and BBQ pork as side dishes. We always have more than we can eat, so we have left overs for the next day.  One could order one meal and share.  
they also have family style meals. The prices are very fair.

data.title: Good Chinese Food
data.text: We are always satisfied when we dine here, the waitress knows us from the many visits we've had, food is always good, sometimes service can be a little slow but the owner picks up the slack when they get a little busy and takes care of us, and if your a drinker you must visit the bar, you get your moneys worth and some

data.title: Worst delivery service ever!
data.text: Ordered simple meal for 4. After 2 hours, no call. We call them, driver already left. After 2.5 hours, driver just leaving. Unwilling to comp meal aft nearly waiting 3 hours. Finally food shows up, missing half the meal. So we call back, and the best they come up with is 'crazy busy'. Finally comp the meal after 3 hours and a half delivered cold order. Awful.

data.title: Good Chinese
data.text: Good for take out or delivery. Restaurant old & dated. I  ordered take out from the lounge & had a couple beers while I waited. Asparagus chicken was excellent.

data.title: Good food, large portions
data.text:
I read some of the other reviews and was a bit hesitant to order from here. I'm glad we did. Prices were very reasonable, phone order for delivery was very pleasant, easy to deal with person on phone. The delivery man also very pleasant to deal with. 

The delivery itself was given 1-1:15 hour estimate and received food in about 40 minutes. The food itself was very tasty, as well as huge portions. From my experience I would recommend to others as well as return myself if in the area.

data.title: Was a little apprehensive at first but then
data.text: The decor was a little dated but the food was Incredible  we started with lettuce wraps very good.   We then decided to order plates instead of combos because the plates sounded good   honey glazed walnut chicken was spectacular house looks me in was great orange chicken very flavourful  and asparagus beef wow hint of spice overall exeded my expectations and would definitely recommend

data.title: Old restaurant - decent food
data.text: Service was great and the food was good.  The interior of the main dining room is dark. Typical menu for a Chinese restaurant.

data.title: Amazing
data.text: The  lotus garden, was by far the best "combo like" meal i've eaten from a chinese food place in a long time!!  You could taste the difference, everything was FRESH and made to order!! I would definately go back!

data.title: Dont Waste Your Money
data.text:
I dont like writing bad reviews, but this place is horrible.

We called in an order to be delivered. Placing the order seemed to be a HUGE challenge for the person taking the order.
 
The order finally arrived and it was not correct. We called back to ask for the rest of our order and we were asked if we really needed the rice. REALLY??? A couple of us ordered curry. 

The rest of the order arrived and AGAIN it was wrong. Aside from this the food was HORRIBLE.

I wish I could say that maybe they were just having an "off" day, but I had a similiar dine in experience with them. 

I could go on but enough said. If you are looking for good chinese, look elsewhere.
